Invocation Name: the jag show
des: The Jag Show Podcast - Jon "JAG" Gay creates podcasts for businesses and nonprofits through his company, JAG in Detroit. A 15 year radio veteran, he brings a decade and a half of audio experience and perspective to the podcasting world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
